creator: Litlot
descriptionHtml:
Ever wanted to create SHORT VIDEOS using an INDIAN APP? then your search ends here.

This app has all the feature to create awesome short videos with beauty, filters and music.

=========
FEATURES
=========
🎥 Video Recording
You can record awesome short videos of 15 or 60 seconds with front and back camera.

💄 Filters
You can easily apply different filters to make your video look unique.

👧 Beauty
You can adjust beauty level of the camera. With our AI technology it identifies your face and applies beauty on it to make it more beautiful.

💥 Effects
We have many effects which you can easily apply while recording or after recording the video.

🏃 Speed
You can adjust video recording speed as well as you can adjust the speed of the video after recording it. You can easily prepare SLOW MOTION videos or REVERSE videos too.

🕐 Timer
Setup timer for recording and let the app start recording when you are ready.

🎶 Music Selection
You can add music of your choice while video recording or after recording finished from your own device.

🎨 Free Hand Drawing
Want to draw or add a gesture in your video? Why not. You can do that too.

✔ Save & Share
Save your awesome creation in your phone and share it with your friends. Make sure you add #LitLotApp #IndianApp.

=============
COMING SOON
=============
Profile
Create your profile and manage your own created videos. You can follow other users and let others follow you.

Video Browsing
Browser & watch videos of other creators. Like, Comment, Download and Share.

Video Uploading
Are you video creator? Then why not create and upload your videos so that world can notice your talent.

=============
OUR AGENDA
=============
Our main agenda behind this app is to provide an INDIAN PLATFORM to INDIAN PEOPLE so that they can easily showcase their talent. In the future we will continue adding more and more features to this app. We want to make this as the NUMBER ONE video sharing app with your support. If you install and feel that this app can really go ahead then do share it with your friends, family members and colleagues.

=============
CONTACT US
=============
📨 For any queries please write us at litlotapp@gmail.com
✌ Want to invest in this app? Submit your details here https://forms.gle/51ESYL44Gk6hudTy8
